title: Fruit harvesting robots - Modern technology in agriculture

tasks.task: Use a reel mower to cut grass
subtasks: Start the reel mower engine
Navigate the mower through the grass area
Position the mower to avoid obstacles
Adjust the mower's height for proper cutting
Check for and remove debris from cutting blades
Refuel the mower as needed

tasks.task: Drive a tractor equipped with mowing blades
subtasks: Ascend a hill while operating the tractor
Manually steer the tractor to stay on the path
Engage the mowing blades and begin cutting
Monitor the blade coverage and adjust direction if necessary
Descend the hill safely, maintaining control

tasks.task: Operate a riding mower on a steep slope
subtasks: Position the mower on the slope
Engage the safety features before driving up the slope
Drive the mower up the slope at a controlled speed
Mow the slope while steering carefully to avoid tipping
Descend the slope gradually, using appropriate controls

tasks.task: Maintain a lawn by mowing irregular areas
subtasks: Identify areas where the grass is longer
Choose the appropriate mower for the terrain
Manual mowing in tight or obstructed spaces
Alternate between different mowing patterns to achieve even cut

tasks.task: Identify and fix a mower issue
subtasks: Detect the problem with the mower's cutting mechanism
Locate the fault, possibly a clog or blade wear
Clear any debris from the blades or deck
If necessary, adjust or replace parts such as blades or tension springs

tasks.task: Manage grass clippings while mowing
subtasks: Decide whether to bag the clippings or leave them on the lawn
Adjust the mower's discharge port if bagging
If mulching, ensure proper clipping distribution

tasks.task: Load a trailer with harvested crops
subtasks: Securely tie down the items to be transported
Load the trailer ensuring balance and stability
Attach the trailer to the tractor or truck
Check all connections and fastenings

tasks.task: Unload a trailer at the storage area
subtasks: Detach the trailer from the vehicle
Guide the trailer to the designated unloading spot
Check for any damage during transport
Disassemble the load and store the items properly

tasks.task: Operate a riding mower on uneven ground
subtasks: Assess the terrain for potential hazards
Adjust the mower's height for optimal cutting on uneven areas
Maintain a steady speed and monitor the mower's position to avoid tipping
Navigate around obstacles such as rocks or trees

tasks.task: Use a walking stick to test soil moisture
subtasks: Walk through the fields carrying the stick
Immerse the stick into the soil to measure moisture
Determine if irrigation is needed based on moisture level

tasks.task: Drive a tractor in reverse on a slope
subtasks: Ascend the slope, then reverse direction
Maneuver the tractor backwards down the slope
Use the rear view mirror and observation to avoid accidents

tasks.task: Adjust the incoming clutch on a riding mower
subtasks: Locate the clutch adjustment mechanism
Determine the proper tension required for the mower blades
Make the necessary adjustments to the clutch

tasks.task: Drive a tractor with a mower on a tight curve
subtasks: Identify the tight curve
Slow down approaching the curve
Steer smoothly through the curve, adjusting speed as needed
Continue at a low speed if necessary to maintain control
Use a reel mower to cut grass, SUBTASK: Start the engine,SUBTASK: Navigate, etc.}
